title.narrative: Increasing the role of women in the local structures of the political parties

description.narrative: More than 50% of the population in Azerbaijan are women. However position of women in the socio-political life of the country is not satisfactory. The number of the elected women was increased during the last municipality and parliamentary elections but th ere is no woman from the oppositional parties either in the parliament or municipalities. The anti-democratic conditions in the country prevent women from being engaged in politics. The goal of the project is to contribute to the establishment of joint rig hts and joint opportunities for women and respect to women's rights in the society. The project will be carried out during 12 months in five regions: Masalli Shirvan Guba Gakh and Gzakh in three stages. The first and second stages will be two days training s and the third stage will be round tables in each of five regions. The objectives of the project are 1) to improve the leadership skills of women from political parties and non-partisan women in the regions 2) to bring together women from oppositional and ruling parties and non-partisan women 3) to strengthen the position of the women from the political parties in their parties and partly increase the role of women in the politics by attracting non-partisan women to the political parties. Active women wil l also establish different NGOs for the solution of the different problems. Thus women will have opportunity to the active participation in the socio-political life of their regions.
